long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate passwords that are semantically correct.
The passwords are more secure the longer they are. They don't need symbols or special characters at all.
We end up using cryptic passwords that are impossible to type.
This generator uses NLP technology to create semantically meaningful passwords.
